refSource: Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
fullText:
Disciple of Justice

Prerequisite: Charisma 13
Benefit: When you use your second wind, you can choose one ally adjacent to you to regain the hit points granted by it. If you do so, you don’t regain the hit points.

Published in Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 312, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 313.
